title: What is the complete interpretation and meaning of seeing a fall in a dream?

preview.html: Hadot website offers you an interpretation of how to dream that you are falling. It is reported that this dream is one of the most studied dreams in recent years, as falling or surviving after falling in a dream has many signs, some good and some bad, and there is a dream book about falling from a height. And death, as we found for you the interpretation of a dream about the fall and death of a child from experts in interpreting visions and dreams. Knowing the correct and correct interpretation, you must follow the article. Why dream of falling in love with Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that seeing an entire human being in a dream falling from a height indicates his transition to a new life, and this vision in some cases indicates the problems that the dreamer faces. And when he sees falling In a green garden or a mosque in a complete dream, this testifies to his repentance and avoiding taboos. In addition, when a person dreams of falling and then dying, this means a new beginning and a life full of success and achieving goals, and God knows best. And when a person sees in a dream a complete car falling From a height, the passage of problems and difficulties in his life and the presence of a car in his dream testifies that he overcomes these difficulties easily and decisively, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of running in a dream completely? Why do you dream of falling from a height for lonely people? They say that in a dream they see the same girl falling from a high place And high, this indicates that she is going through a difficult time, but she will overcome it soon. A dream about an unmarried woman indicates a new life, perhaps an engagement or marriage, and God knows best. And when you see a girl in a dream who is perfect because she fell from above and this girl is engaged, this is a warning of... The approaching marriage and success in her marital and emotional life, and God knows best. See also: Why does Ibn Sirin dream of seeing an entire mountain in a dream? Why does she dream of falling in love with a married woman? If you see a married woman without children falling from a height, this indicates that she is barren and that God does not care. With her children, and God knows best. I saw her falling from above and from afar. This indicates that she is on the verge of menopause. Interpreter scholars have also indicated that seeing a married woman in a dream is full of unpleasant visions that do not indicate goodness, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a roof in a dream and its meaning? Why do you dream of falling in a complete dream for a pregnant woman when she dreams A pregnant woman falling from a height into the mud, this indicates that God will bless her with a child, and God knows best. And her falling from a height in a dream indicates a complete way out of distress and disasters, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a tower in a dream, with complete details? Why dream of children falling? They say that when He sees his son falling from a height, this indicates problems and disasters that may befall the dreamer, and God knows best. Why do you dream of a child falling and dying? They say that when a person sees an entire child falling in a dream, and this leads to his death, this indicates kindness, good events, and plenty of food. A child falling and dying in The dream testifies to goodness, success, and achieving goals, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, leave it in

title: Lice in a dream is interpreted between good and evil

preview.html: Lice in a dream represents a world of money, and if lice are on new clothes, it means renewal of life. If he wears the dress, it is a place he is afraid of. Lice on the ground are cowardly people, and if they bite them, they are immoral or immoral people. And whoever sees a louse flying from his chest, he has a worker, boy, boy or woman running away from him. Lice are for the powerful, soldiers and enemies, ministers have entourages, police have assistants, scholars have students, and the sick are doctors. And whoever sees that he has thrown a live louse, he will divorce his wife. Lice are miserable, and lice are children, or the poor person is miserable and shameful, or it is justice, grace, blessing, and salvation from distress and care. Whoever sees a lot of lice crawling, it is evidence of annoyance, loss, and need, and killing lice in a dream relieves the afflicted person of his grief and rids him of his sadness. Whoever picks lice from his clothes is lying to him in good manners. Whoever is bitten by lice will be accused by weak people of vulgarity and immorality. If lice is removed from his head, this means that evil people have been removed from his house. Perhaps lice in the hair indicates bad deeds, and lice in a woman’s hair indicates her children. Lice remains in a man’s hair for adornment, preservation, and money. If he sees lice in his hair, he will die, and if he is rich, he will lose his money. If a woman sees that her hair has lice, this means that she is free of her husband’s money. Interpretation of lice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: If the lice are on new clothes, this means an increase in debt. If it is on earth, then it is an evil people, and if it is moving around it, it accompanies weak souls, and none of them harm it. Lice is bitten by a weak enemy, and whoever sees that a large louse has emerged from his body and gone from him, this indicates the deterioration of his life, and it is said that the louse symbolizes children and their kindness. It was said that lice indicate worries and imprisonment, which is an increase in anxiety, and is consumed by gossip. You may also be interested in: The dress in a dream, and large lice in a dream are unhappiness, and it was said: It is a gathering of the king and the children of men, and whoever collects lice from his clothes is lying to him. Lice is torment because it is one of the signs of Moses, peace be upon him. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a bed in a dream, as well as frogs and blood, because they are signs that the Children of Israel were tortured with, except that the people gathered together or ate them, and they had no spoils or harm, because they are food given to them and their sustenance is guaranteed. . Hmm. It is said: Collecting lice in a jar indicates dirhams and dinars, and it is said: A man came to Ibn Sirin and said: I saw that I ate a louse and put it in a jar. He said: I struck dirhams and paid them to a woman. You may also be interested in the following: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream. Whoever sees a louse or the like in a bite of his food, he will find a deficiency in his life, and lice in a dream are like worms, indicating an abundance of children. Lice is a man’s family, and if he sees lice or Worms are scattered throughout his body or from some of his organs, and he sees that they are many in his body, on his clothes, or on one of them. He will gain money and his dependents. In a dream, lice, fleas, bed bugs, and the like. Lice in a dream is interpreted as money, fitness, or progeny. Al-Kirmani said: Whoever sees a louse crawling to him He is dependent on a people who feed on his food. Whoever sees lice comes out of it

title: Interpretation of dreams about the vagina of a girl or married woman in a dream: marriage and scandal

preview.html: The private part of a girl or married woman is a part of her body that she must keep and only her husband can see. This is why many girls or women wonder when to expose the private parts of a married girl or woman. A dream because it is natural to appear in front of people, so we will explain what Dream Interpreters said about this vision. Interpretation of a dream about firewood in a dream – a symbol of seeing firewood in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of a girl or a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the appearance of a girl’s vulva An unmarried woman in a dream may be a sign that she will get married in the near future. But if a girl sees that men see her vulva in a dream, this may be a sign that this girl will commit a major immoral act and commit sins and forbidden things. Also, the appearance of the vulva in a dream is one of the signs that indicates... On the pregnancy and childbirth of a married woman, especially if this vulva appears in front of the husband. If the dreamer is going through a state of distress, sadness, and anxiety, then the appearance of the vulva in the dream is one of the signs that heralds the end of the state of distress that he is experiencing. Interpretation of a dream about shaving one’s hair in a dream – a symbol To see hair cut in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a girl or married woman’s dream in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that the vagina in a married woman’s dream is one of the signs that indicate a lack of money or falling into a financial crisis for that woman. As for the appearance of a girl’s vagina in front of men in a dream, It may indicate that this girl will be exposed to a major scandal in the coming days. If the married woman who appears in the dream is pregnant, then the appearance of the vagina in the dream is one of the signs that she will give birth naturally, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a garden in a dream for a single woman in detail - a symbol To see orchards in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a girl’s or a married woman’s vulva in a dream by the true Imam. Imam Al-Sadiq says that the appearance of the vulva in a dream of a married woman who is late in having children, portends the imminence of childbearing. As for a pregnant married woman, seeing her vulva in a dream is a sign of male childbirth. God willing. As for the appearance of the vagina in a single girl’s dream, it is one of the signs that warn of the approach of a relationship. If a woman sees herself in general cleaning her vagina in a dream, this indicates that she committed a sin in the previous period, but she repented and stopped committing this sin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Baqarah In a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a girl or a married woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that the appearance of a woman’s vulva is a sign that this woman will be exposed to a major scandal or that a dangerous secret concerning this woman will be revealed. The vulva can also be in the dream of a married woman who is currently suffering from marital problems. With her husband, there is good news for her that reconciliation with her husband is approaching. If a woman is generally seen as preventing her organs from being seen in public places, this indicates that she is a woman of purity, chastity, and a good reputation. Ibn Shaheen confirms that the vagina in a married woman’s dream is a sign of multiple births. Explanation

title: Interpretation of a dream about defending religion in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about defending religion in Ibn Sirin’s dream: The Islamic religion is the last of the heavenly religions that God Almighty revealed to His servants, and God chose our master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, to represent him. It calls people and invites them to the path of truth and leads them from the darkness of disbelief to the light of faith. Large numbers of different tribes entered this religion, with the exception of groups that considered it to be misguidance, and that the worship of idols, which is the worship of their ancestors, is the truth, and Muslims confront the infidels and confront them. To defend their religion, which is the union of their affairs, and defending religion in reality is a duty, while in a dream it may refer to other elements, so many wanted to know the interpretation of a dream about defending religion in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and the following are interpretations about it. Interpretation of a dream about defending Islam for single people, God Almighty has legislated It is for all Muslims, men and women, to preserve and defend the religion, and to sacrifice for it everything that is precious and precious. The following is the interpretation of a dream about defending Islam for unmarried women: Seeing defending Islam in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates his righteousness, the uprightness of his condition, and his desire to perform the mission and refrain from disobedience and wrongdoing. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream means that she is defending Islam because of her brilliant success and distinction in her academic life. And the process. Seeing an unmarried girl defending Islam indicates her ability to face the various difficulties that she may face. This vision explains the strength of her personality and her keenness and enthusiasm for her religion. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is defending Islam, this indicates that she is trying to do good and her willingness to gain approval. God Almighty in this world and the hereafter. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a Qur’an necklace in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Seeing the Defense The Messenger in a dream Our Prophet Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, is the seal of the prophets and messengers. God sent him to all people and supported him with many miracles, including material and moral, the most important of which is the Holy Qur’an. One and he is still witness to this and that the religion of God is the religion of truth, and the Messenger’s defense of the defense of religion, and the following is an explanation of the vision of the Messenger’s defense in a dream: Seeing the defense of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream indicates the good condition of the dreamer and his intense love for the Messenger and Islam. Seeing our Master Muhammad in a dream and defending him means that the dreamer feels the responsibility of defending the religion and the fear of it from the enemies of Islam. This vision indicates the integrity of the dreamer, the strength of his character, and his methods of persuasion to become a famous preacher. See also: Interpretation of dreams that a dead person tells me that I will die in the dream. Interpretation of the dream of defending correctly. We are living In an era of turmoil, many distractions, the permissibility of suspicions, spreading them, slander, and propaganda for disobedience and sins, without fear of God Almighty, and without realizing the sins that may befall him due to these actions. Justice, and the following is the interpretation of the dream of defending the truth: Seeing yourself defending the truth in a dream indicates a change of position from one to another that is better, and a feeling of improvement and happiness. Seeing yourself defending the truth suggests that the dreamer will

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an expanding ring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dropping a ring extending in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing a ring extending in a dream means ample nourishment and removing worries, and God knows best. Also, seeing a ring extending in a dream indicates progress in work, excellence, success, and a high status that the dreamer sees in his dream. Seeing a ring extending in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance and that the dreamer is entering into a good and profitable business or trade and doing many things. Interpretation of dropping a ring extending in a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees in her dream that she is spreading a ring, this indicates her close relationship and that she is approaching and setting the date for marriage to a man. The good. Also, seeing a ring extending on the hand of a stranger indicates an unmarried girl’s sorrows, anxiety, disagreements, and misfortunes. Also, seeing a ring extending in a dream indicates that the girl’s life is difficult, that she has lost a lot of her money, and that she is in a financial crisis. Seeing the ring extending is for one Her friends may indicate the sincerity of her friends towards her, and it also indicates faith and repentance to God who has no partner. Interpretation of seeing an expanding ring in a dream for a married woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is spreading the ring, this indicates the collapse of the disputes between her and her husband and her short pregnancy. It also indicates This vision for a married woman means achieving what she wants, achieving goals, and higher education for her children in their studies and lives. Also, seeing the violent expansion of the ring for a married woman may indicate her betrayal of her husband and her close marriage to someone other than her husband. Interpretation of seeing an expanding ring in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that she She expands the ring in a dream, as this indicates the end of her worries, the ease of childbirth, and the safety of her family. Also, seeing the ring expanding in a dream and her husband helping her indicates that her husband will join a new job, and it also indicates lawful food and abundant money. Interpretation of a dream about giving a ring to someone in A dream: If someone dreams that he is giving a ring to a stranger, this means that the dreamer’s worries will go away and that he will do many good deeds for the sake of God. Seeing someone giving a ring in a dream indicates the high position and status that this person will occupy in his life. Interpretation of seeing a lost and found ring. If a dream In a dream, a person finds a ring and then takes it and will not return it to its owners. This indicates that the opinion is deceitful, and God knows best. Also, seeing the loss of a ring in a dream indicates the dreamer’s failure in life, the loss of his dream, and the loss of his goals that he was striving to achieve. The missing link to the speedy recovery of the pioneer if he is sick and it explains that the soul is in the heart of the dreamer, and God knows best. Also, seeing a ring extending in a dream indicates progress in work, excellence, success, and a high status that the dreamer sees in his dream. Seeing a ring extending in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance and that the dreamer is entering into a good and profitable business or trade and doing many things. Interpretation of dropping a ring extending in a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees in her dream that she is spreading a ring, this indicates her close relationship and that she is approaching and setting the date for marriage to a man. The good. Also, seeing a ring extending on the hand of a stranger indicates an unmarried girl’s sorrows, anxiety, disagreements, and misfortunes. Also, seeing a ring extending in a dream indicates that the girl’s life is difficult, that she has lost a lot of her money, and that she is in a financial crisis. Seeing the ring extending is for one Her friends may indicate the sincerity of her friends towards her, and it also indicates faith and repentance to God who has no partner. Interpretation of seeing an expanding ring in a dream for a married woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is spreading the ring, this indicates the collapse of the disputes between her and her husband and her short pregnancy. It also indicates This vision for a married woman means achieving what she wants, achieving goals, and higher education for her children in their studies and lives. title: Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin The ring is a symbol of marriage when marriage is between two people, each of whom wears a ring. It is one of the most beautiful things that everyone loves and it contains gold and silver. Today we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream, whether for a man or a woman, because it has many different meanings. We will explain it in detail through our article because a large number of people are searching for it. The interpretation of this dream, as many people see it in a dream, and the correct interpretation must be known by the unmarried man, the married man, and the unmarried woman. The interpretation also varies according to marital status. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing the ring. The ring inside a dream can indicate To status and power. Whoever sees in his dream that he has found weakness. Whoever sees the ring in a dream twisted or missing, this indicates the presence of defects in that person. If a bumper ring is seen in the dream, this indicates the presence of many defects in the spouse. If it is tight It is a sign of marriage. If a divorced woman sees in the ring evidence of a new stable life or the return of her husband. It indicates money and a new life full of fun. If there is a crack, this indicates the presence of problems at work or the emergence of some marital disputes. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a woman Single: A girl who sees a twisted ring in a dream indicates the bad ways of her fiancé. A ringing sound in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates her marriage. Seeing the ring for the girl only on the right side shows marriage in the near future. The appearance of the carnation proves that God has blessed her with a prestigious husband. Losing the ring indicates in The dream indicates annulment of the engagement. A wide ring in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that her fiancé is not suitable for her, but if it is narrow, it does not matter. Interpretation of seeing a ring for a married woman: If a married woman sees inside a dream, the silver or gold ring on the right hand shows her husband’s love for her. If she sees Her husband gives her a ring, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If a married woman sees a broken ring, this indicates bad news and bad events. Interpretation of seeing a ring for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream a ring made of gold, then the baby is female, and if it is made of silver, then it is male. If the ring is Filled with carnations and precious stones, the boy will be smart and give advice. Interpretation of seeing a ring for a manIf a man sees it in a dream, a wedding will take place soon. If the ring is made of iron, it means goodness and money, but if it is made of gold, this indicates some difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about a broken ring in A dream about breaking a ring. In a dream, this is one of the dreams that worries the dreamer, because breaking a ring is evidence of the nearest evil in the dreamer’s life. It is considered to be a division. It is also a sign for the dreamer that evil may leave him soon, but he must be patient and have will and determination. If the dreamer is in a romantic relationship, then This vision may indicate his separation from his girlfriend or life partner due to many issues that were not resolved well between them. Interpretation of a dream about wearing two gold rings for a married woman

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sea and swimming in it in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sea and swimming in it in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Through the article, we will talk about the interpretation of the dream of seeing the sea, as we will mention all the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin in the dictionary of dream interpretations, and we will mention other interpretations of various topics related to seeing the sea in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sea according to Nabulsi. Many scholars have mentioned many explanations and explanations for the pioneer of seeing the sea in a dream, and the interpretations differed according to the person’s vision of the sea and his situation on the ground. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sea. See also: Interpretation of the dream of driving a car next to the driver in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the sea and swimming. In a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin mentioned many interpretations about seeing the sea in a dream and expressed seeing the sea with good and bad interpretations that are reflected in the dreamer in his life. The vision indicates the power and authority that the dreamer will gain in the next period of his life. A merchant seeing the sea is a sign of great profits. Which he will obtain from his trade in the coming period. The vision also indicates a new job for the pioneer. The vision also symbolizes the dreamer’s success in his professional life. Seeing her drowning in the sea is a sign that the dreamer has reached a prominent position in his society. Seeing sea water indicates that it is... It flows into the return of a lot of confusion to the dreamer in his life. Also, seeing the dreamer urinating in a dream indicates the dreamer’s evil and illegal actions in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about entering the Kaaba from within a dream about a married woman and a man. Interpretations of a dream about a stormy sea, in addition to the interpretations we mentioned. And the connotations of seeing the sea in general in the dreamer’s dream, we will also mention explanations and interpretations of seeing the raging sea in the fortuneteller’s dream, and here are the most important interpretations that were mentioned about seeing the raging sea that were expressed by scholars in dream interpretation books: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the sea The dream indicates the difficulty of obtaining money. For the dreamer in his life. The vision also indicates the changes that occur in the dreamer’s life, which are bad and not good. Seeing the dreamer swimming in a raging sea in a dream means that the dreamer’s desires will come true quickly. Also, seeing a raging sea is considered a quick marriage in the near future. The vision indicates The difficulties faced by the viewer in the field of work or study. To see in a dream that you reach the depths of a raging sea indicates the dreamer’s success in his studies. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a man carrying a child according to Ibn Sirin in a dream and its interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the sea for a single woman, in addition to the interpretations that we mentioned about seeing The sea mentioned by Ibn Sirin and the vision of the raging sea by Al-Raed, we will also mention in the context of the article interpretations and interpretations of Al-Raed’s vision of the sea. The unmarried girl. Here are the most important interpretations mentioned by commentators in their books, which differed according to the person’s vision in the dream: A single girl who sees the calm sea in a dream indicates a stable emotional life and a feeling of happiness in her life. Seeing the calm and beautiful sea for a girl in a dream indicates a happy life.

title: Seeing yourself eating grapes in a dream

preview.html: Grapes are also considered beneficial for the body because they contain a large amount of minerals that the body needs, and dream interpretation scholars have been able to give clear explanations about seeing grapes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eating grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin presented all the explanations for the appearance of grapes in a dream. A dream and in the following lines, one of the most important of these interpretations is: seeing grapes in a dream from Ibn Sirin’s point of view. It indicates an abundance of sustenance and many blessings, and that the dreamer will achieve many gains in his life and will do whatever he wants in his life. Ibn Sirin interpreted the sweetest person who saw grapes in a dream It indicates that this young man will get married soon, and his life will change for the better, and his relationship with all people will become strong. If the dreamer sees vines in his dream. This vision indicates that this person will get all the charming ladies. If the dreamer sees grapes in his dream during the grape season. And this vision Good except insofar as they appear at a time when they are not planted. Seeing grapes in a dream indicates generosity and that the dreamer gives and provides kindness and sustenance to those around him without expecting anything in return. Seeing grapes in a dream for a sick person indicates that the person will recover from His illness. If the sad dreamer sees grapes in his sleep. This vision shows that sadness will disappear and good intentions will prevail. Grape juice in a dream. It indicates solving problems and increasing his gains and that his condition will improve for the better by the command of God Almighty, and God knows best. Interpretation of eating grapes in a dream for Nablus. A scholar was able Nabulsi’s dream interpretation explains to you the appearance of eating grapes in a dream, and in the following lines the most important of these interpretations are given to you: Seeing grapes in a dream for Nabulsi indicates the abundance of sustenance and bliss that the dreamer will obtain in his life. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is picking grapes, then this vision It indicates that the person will get a lot of money. What if the dreamer sees himself squeezing grapes? This vision shows that the dreamer does many bad deeds in his life. He must approach God Almighty and stay away from these matters. If a married man sees grapes in his dream. This vision shows that God will bless him with a good son. Al-Nabulsi was able to explain that he saw bunches of grapes piled on trees in a dream. It indicates the dreamer’s ability to achieve all his dreams. If the dreamer sees himself in a dream pressing grapes, leaning on a wooden stick. This vision shows The vision is that the dreamer is a deceitful person who carries out the orders of the oppressor. If a person sees himself pouring grape juice into a bowl. This vision indicates that he will obtain a lot of money in his life. Seeing light grapes in a dream. It indicates the bliss and sustenance that the dreamer will obtain, and also that He will obtain abundant money and all his circumstances will improve. If a person sees himself in a dream eating grape leaves. This vision is an indication of the separation of this husband from his wife in the event of the dreamer’s marriage. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of eating grapes in a dream for a single woman. There are interpretations There are many interpretations about the appearance of grapes in a single girl’s dream, and one of the most important of these interpretations is...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about stealing money from Ibn Sirin’s bag?

preview.html: What you do not know is that you see theft in a dream. Stealing is a taboo matter, and it is a hated and unwanted habit. The definition of theft is an attempt to possess what is not yours without the knowledge of the owner of the thing, whether it is money, food, or anything else, but theft in a dream is different. Meanings depending on the psychological and social state of the viewer and interpretive scholars. Interpretation of stealing money in a dream for men by Ibn Sirin. Losing money in a dream has been confirmed by some interpreters that it is good and food, as the money that will soon reach the dreamer may be in reality. Whoever has his money stolen in a dream, this is evidence of good news, Especially if it is from an influential person in reality. Stealing money from the dreamer is evidence of the blessing of money, children, health, and doubling of maintenance in reality. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website by Google. Interpretation of stealing money. Seeing the thief after stealing the money and trying to catch him is evidence On the love of life and the fear of losing anything in reality to the dreamer. The return of the thing that the thief stole in a dream indicates the return of an expatriate who is already absent from his family. The return of stolen money in a dream is evidence of a prestigious position that you will obtain in reality or a promotion in an old job. It will move you from one position to a higher position. Interpretation of stealing money in a married woman’s dream: Stealing money and gold in a dream for a married woman is evidence of her husband’s intense love for her and jealousy of him. It may be evidence of fear of what is to come, and it may be anxiety about the dreamer’s suffering from it. A married woman’s dream of stealing is evidence of the loss that the dreamer is experiencing and the torment that he feels from the pain. Stealing in a married woman’s dream and returning stolen goods is a good thing and has elements of escaping from the distress she is exposed to and the problems that surround her in reality. Interpretation of seeing money stolen from a bag in A dream for a single woman: A bag in a dream is a personal matter, so in the interpretation of stealing money from it, this is evidence of the loss of a loved one. Stealing a bag in a dream shows love desires and it may be the loss of the job you are working on in reality. Stealing money from an unmarried woman is evidence of the approaching date. Marrying a good-looking young man for her in reality, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Sources:- 1- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, research by Basil Breidi, Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 2- Book of Selected Sayings on the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma'rifa, Beirut 2000.
